commit.message:
bfin.c (override_options): Reorder tests so that flag_pic gets enabled for -msep-data.

	* config/bfin/bfin.c (override_options): Reorder tests so that
	flag_pic gets enabled for -msep-data.

From-SVN: r131829

+	flag_pic gets enabled for -msep-data.
